Reduce your cover to Social, Domestic and Pleasure use.
 

Policy No: %Policy_No%
MyAllianz
 
028 90 828 828

HI %FIRSTNAME%

During these uncertain times we want to do everything we can to make things a little easier for you. That’s why for taxi drivers no longer able to work due to the Covid-19 crisis, we can reduce your cover to Social, Domestic and Pleasure use for an initial period, up until 31st May 2020.

Customers who have paid their premium in full will be entitled to a refund and those paying by direct debit can avail of different payment options.
 

WHAT DO YOU NEED TO DO?
 

Call us on 028 90 828 828
 

Remove your roof sign & taxi plate
 
CALL US NOW

It’s important to note that you will still be covered for voluntary work in relation to the Covid-19 crisis but paid work to assist with deliveries etc. is not covered under social, domestic and pleasure use.
